Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Subject: Astronomy
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Name.author: Shūshtarī, Ḥasan
Title: Nujūm
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 170,1447
Description.abstract: First two folios are illuminated. Work contains tables bordered in gold, red and green ink. Using the astronomical tables (zīj) of Muḥammad Shāh, Shūshtarī predicts a lunar eclipse on Thursday the 14th of Muḥarram 1277 A.H.(August 2nd 1860 A.D.). In the year 1860 A.D. a total eclipse of the sun was observed on July 18th and a lunar eclipse was observed on February 7th.
Description.citation: Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1039 AH), p. 53.
